testcase.name: Free CRM new deals functionality test
testcase.system-out: Given user is present on Login Page.........................................passed When title of Login Page is Free CRM........................................passed Then user enters credentials userName and password..........................passed Then user clicks on Login button............................................passed Then user is on Home Page...................................................passed Then user moves to new deals page...........................................passed And user enters deals details...............................................passed And verify that deals details successfully added............................passed Then close the application and browser......................................passed
